value.0:
NOTE: Only Changes to NWN Spells are Shown!

Harm 
- 10 Damage per Character Level
- 150 Maximum Damage
- Heals Undead

Heal
- 10 Heal per Character Level
- 150 Hitpoints Maximum
- Harms Undead
	
Mass Heal
- 10 Heal per Character Level
- 250 Hitpoints Maximum to Every Creature in 6 Meter Radius
- Harms Undead

Time-stop 
- 120 Second Cooldown Timer between Casting
- 7 Seconds and is an Area Of Effect Spell. Radius is 20 Meters. 

Greater Sanctuary 
- 120 Second Cooldown Timer between Casting
- Duration is fixed at 8 Rounds
- This is banned in PvP.

Invisibility & Invisibility Sphere
- Duration is 1 Round per 4 Caster Levels with 2 Round Minimum
- Metamagic Extend for Double
- 10% Concealment Bonus
- NO Invisibility

Improved Invisibility
- Duration is 1 Round per 3 Caster Levels with 3 Round Minimum
- Metamagic Extend for Double 
- 50% Concealment Bonus
- NO Invisibility

All Bigby Spells modified for Duration. 
- 7 Rounds. 
- 10 Rounds Maximized.
 
Power Word Kill 
Change: Caster Level 22 and up 200 Base plus Bonuses as shown below. 
22-24 +25 
25-27 +50 
28-30 +75 
31-33 +100 
34-36 +125 
37-40 +150 
Description: This spell may be cast on a single creature or as an area effect. A targeted creature of up to 200 or Bonus Hit Points is killed instantly. As an area effect, this spell will kill all creatures with fewer than 40 Hit Points, to a maximum total of 200 or Bonus Hit Points. 

Meteor Storm and Bombardment 
- No longer any Reflex Save. Does WAY more Damage. 
- Fire Resistance still applies to Meteor Storm Fire Damage. 

Shifting/Polymorphing will transfer equipped items better....still depends upon Shape Change but is much better.
